about_the_game: With this DLC, you unlock the fascinating double life of Jason - a savvy trader under the sun and a vibrant DJ when moonlight hits. You're tasked to shape his fresh, unfurnished loft into a chic, comforting retreat that reflects his dynamic lifestyle. Design Jason's Room, merging day-time professionalism with night-time glamour. Unlock an array of unique décor and amenities, tailoring a haven that encapsulates the essence of this modern-day Renaissance man. Let your creativity run wild!
detailed_description: With this DLC, you unlock the fascinating double life of Jason - a savvy trader under the sun and a vibrant DJ when moonlight hits. You're tasked to shape his fresh, unfurnished loft into a chic, comforting retreat that reflects his dynamic lifestyle. Design Jason's Room, merging day-time professionalism with night-time glamour. Unlock an array of unique décor and amenities, tailoring a haven that encapsulates the essence of this modern-day Renaissance man. Let your creativity run wild!

short_description: Step into the life of Jason, a professional trader by day and a charismatic DJ by night. In this DLC, take on the challenge of transforming his empty loft into a serene sanctuary, striking a balance between style, comfort, and functionality.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Swedish*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Malay*
